      • PlanTaskSession

        public PlanTaskSession(IView cli,
               ProjectHandler ph,
               UserHandler uh,
               DelegatedTaskHandler dth,
               Clock clock)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates the planning session using the given UI, ProjectHandler and ResourceHandler.
        Parameters:
        cli - The command line interface.
        ph - The project handler.
        uh - The user handler.
        clock - The system clock.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given view needs to be valid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The project handler, user handler and clock need to be valid.
